page.title: 16THE KEELBY CRICKET CLUB
page.content: The Keelby Cricket Club has its own pavilion and ground.The pavilion has a kitchen,changing rooms,toilets and patio doors so the match can be watched from inside.Every year the club members put on a pantomime for the public to raise money for themselves.Last year they did "Alibaba and the Forty Thieves"and I liked the utra violet light shining on the white knives and forks.I also liked the pantomime of Dick Wittington,in the sea scene the sea was cardboard being pushed from side to side.The boat was on rockers being rocked by the people on it.They have parties for the adults and discos for the children.The Club somtimes go's to Paris for week.Last year they went to the Palace of Versailles.After play refreshments are served inside.They also do fund raising events for different charities
